name: LIFEFLIGHT AUSTRALIA LIMITED
about: LifeFlight Australia Limited is a leading aeromedical organization and flying school headquartered in Brisbane, Queensland. Since 1979, it has helped over 81,000 people through its advanced fleet of rescue helicopters and Air Ambulance jets. The LifeFlight Training Academy, a registered training organization, offers specialized training for pilots, aircrew, doctors, and paramedics, including Helicopter Underwater Escape Training (HUET) and simulations using state-of-the-art equipment like the Thales AW139 full flight simulator. With a strong focus on safety, medical excellence, and community service, LifeFlight Australia operates from multiple bases across Queensland and Singapore, providing 24/7 emergency medical care and training that sets industry standards. LifeFlight Australia is committed to saving lives and serving the community with unparalleled expertise and dedication.
services:
["PMAWHS214 Underwater Helicopter Safety and Escape (HUET)
AVIF0039 Utilize emergency breathing system (EBS)
EBS & HUET Refresher Course
AVI30519 Certificate III in Aviation (Rescue Crew Officer)
AVI40119 Certificate IV in Aviation (Air Crew Officer)
AVIW0020 Refuel Aircraft
Helicopter Landing Officer (HLO) and Helicopter Landing Site Officer (HLSO) Training
Night Vision Imaging System (NVIS) Training
PUAFIR017 Work Safely Around Aircraft"]
